Description:
You’d be hard pressed to find a superfood that packs the same punch as spirulina on a gram per gram basis. Sourced from nutrient-rich blue-green algae, spirulina contains up to 15x more beta-carotene than carrots, 1.5x more calcium than milk, and more iron than spinach. Sounds like Popeye was into the wrong greens. As if it couldn’t get any better, spirulina contains more essential amino acids, iron, protein, B vitamins, vitamins C, D, and E than chlorella. Just 2 servings of spirulina daily gets you the same antioxidant content as about 7+ servings of common fruits and veggies.

Ingredients:
Spirulina whole algae

Directions:
Take one scoop daily with or between meals. Enjoy mixing into juices, smoothies or other favorite recipes.

Details:
Pesticide and Herbicide Free, Non GMO

Important precautions:
Do not use if safety seal is broken or missing. Keep out of reach of children. Keep your licensed health care practitioner informed when using this product. Do not exceed recommended dose. Pregnant or nursing mothers, children under 18 and individuals with a known medical condition should consult a physician before using this or any dietary supplement.

Disclaimer:
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

Description:
Just like the rest of your body, your head of hair needs targeted nourishment to reach its bouncy potential. If you’ve been trying to grow your hair past the same point for an eternity, have chemical damage from years of coloring, or your hair has simply become compromised, get the boost you need with best-selling Hairfluence.
Activate your confidence levels like never before and tap into the benefits of this trusted beauty support system: vitamin A, B vitamins, biotin, vitamin C, vitamin D3, niacin, folate, pantothenic acid, calcium, MSM, collagen hydrolysate, 70% silica bamboo extract and hydrolyzed keratin.
No matter your hair type or hair struggle, you can start seeing results in as little as 30 days. With side benefits like glowing skin and stronger nails around week 2-3, you’ll be living your best life faster than you can say, “Who’s that fabulous goddess in the mirror?”

Ingredients:
MSM, Collagen Hydrolysate, Bamboo Extract & Hydrolyzed Keratin
Other ingredients: Vegetable Cellulose Capsule, L-Leucine

Directions:
Adults take two capsules once daily or as directed by a healthcare professional. For maximum effect, take daily for at least 30 days.

Details:
Lab Verified, Non-GMO

Important precautions:
Do not use if safety seal is broken or missing. Keep out of reach of children. Keep your licensed health care practitioner informed when using this product.

Disclaimer:
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

Description:
Kick your keto diet into high gear with this premium patented beta-hydroxybutyrate (BHB) complex. Formulated to help support increased blood ketone levels, boost athletic endurance, and spark mental energy. Designed For Energy, Fat Burn, Focus, Ketosis. Accelerate Performance, Tastes Great and Mixes Easily into Water or Shakes

Ingredients:
Keto Drive™ Performance Complex, Calcium Beta-Hydroxybutyrate (as goBHB™), Sodium Beta-Hydroxybutyrate (as goBHB™), Magnesium Beta-Hydroxybutyrate Trihydarate (as goBHB™)
Other ingredients: Citric acid, malic acid, natural orange flavor and other natural flavors. Contains 2% or less of: Silica, stevia, natural color, gum blend (gum acacia, guar gum, xanthan gum), salt.

Suggested Use:
Shake or stir vigorously one (1) serving into at least 16 oz. of cold water. Begin with a half (½) scoop to assess tolerance. May be consumed between meals, on an empty stomach, or whenever increased physical and mental performance are desired. Do not exceed three (3) level scoops per day. Use only as directed.

Details:
Non-GMO

Important precautions:
Do not use if safety seal is broken or missing. Keep out of reach of children. Keep your licensed health care practitioner informed when using this product. Do not exceed recommended dose. Pregnant or nursing mothers, children under 18 and individuals with a known medical condition should consult a physician before using this or any dietary supplement. Store in a cool dry place.

Disclaimer:
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

235 g (8.29 oz)

Description:
Healthy Blood Sugar: Ceylon Cinnamon is a powerful antioxidant that may be helpful in supporting healthy blood glucose levels, heart health, and healthy joints. These are just a few of the MANY impressive potential health benefits of one of the most beloved spices on the planet.
Not Your Average (Cassia) Cinnamon: Many people who seek the health benefits of cinnamon will consume larger amounts to maximize their results. Unfortunately, the cinnamon that is commonly sold and used for baking (cassia cinnamon) contains a much larger concentration of coumarin, which may be toxic when taken as a supplement or used consistently in large amounts.
Convenient & Delicious: This supplement comes in easy-to-swallow capsules for convenient daily doses of ceylon cinnamon. However, if you are in the mood for cinnamon, try opening the capsule and sprinkling on top of toast, cereal, or another favorite recipe. The unique flavor is often described as more sophisticated than the more common cassia cinnamon you will find in most grocery stores. Try it for yourself!
Ceylon Cinnamon: Cinnamomum verum, also called ‘true cinnamon tree’ or ‘ceylon cinnamon tree’ is native to the island of Sri Lanka.

Ingredients:
Ceylon Cinnamon (Cinnamomum verum) (bark)
Other ingredients: rice flour, cellulose (vegetable capsule).

Directions:
Take two (2) capsules daily, preferably with meals or as directed by a healthcare professional.

Details:
Free of Gluten, soy, milk, egg, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts, wheat, preservatives, animal products, preservatives and GMOs, Vegan, Lab Verified

Important precautions:
Do not use if safety seal is broken or missing. Keep out of reach of children. Do not exceed recommended dose. Pregnant or nursing mothers, children under 18 and individuals with a known medical condition should consult a physician before using this or any dietary supplement. Store in a cool dry place.

Disclaimer:
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

Description:
Yeah, we know the taste of Apple Cider Vinegar can be a little...potent, and that flavor might not be for everyone, but the benefits are just Too Good to miss out on. That's because ACV contains naturally occurring probiotics and enzymes that may help to support your immune system, digestion, and gut and heart health. Our unique capsules contain a blend of turmeric, cayenne and ginger which come together to create a thermogenic formula designed to help boost your metabolism and support your body's natural detoxifying process.. Without Cider Detox capsules, you can get all the benefits that ACV packs without that potent punch.
Probiotic Powerhouse: Apple Cider Vinegar, Made from apple cider that has undergone a fermentation process, creating health-promoting probiotics and enzymes. Organic Turmeric, Turmeric's potent antioxidant properties may help support joint, brain, heart and overall cellular health. Organic Ginger helps support the immune system, healthy digestion, comfortable movement and heart health. Cayenne may help support digestive health and overall wellness.

Ingredients:
Apple Cider Vinegar Concentrate, Organic Turmeric (Curcuma longa) (root), Organic Ginger (Zingiber officinale) (root), Cayenne (Capsicum annum) (pepper)(Providing 40,000 HU)
Other Ingredients: Vegetable cellulose capsule, maltodextrin, food starch, vegetable magnesium stearate and silica.

Directions:
Take one (1) capsule daily with meals or as directed by your healthcare professional. Use only as directed.

Details:
Free of GMO ingredients, soy, milk, eggs, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts and wheat, Lab Verified

Important precautions:
Do not use if safety seal is broken or missing. Keep out of reach of children. Do not exceed recommended dose. Pregnant or nursing mothers, children under 18 and individuals with a known medical condition should consult a physician before using this or any dietary supplement. Store in a cool dry place.

Disclaimer:
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

Description:
Zhou Nutrition's Horny Goat Weed is formulated to bring you the youthful energy you've been longing for. Take consistently for best results.
Enhanced Energy: This complex is a unique combination of several herbs that have been used by MEN & WOMEN for centuries in Chinese herbal tradition, including Maca Root, Tribulus Terrestris, Muira Puama, Ginseng, and Icariin, which is the active component in Epimedium (the scientific name for Horny Goat Weed). This vegetarian formula was scientifically formulated with just the right amount of each ingredient to maximize results.
Top Rated, Top Quality: This expertly-crafted complex is truly the best of its kind. Only the highest quality ingredients were chosen for this vegetarian-friendly, non-GMO formula. Get ready, you’ll experience more powerful benefits than you ever could’ve imagined from a supplement!
Youthful Energy: You'll love the 'extra' benefits of this blend. Check off your to-do list like never before, and still have plenty of energy left over at the end of the day. Our herbal ingredients are formulated to bring a healthy spark to your day without the jitters. Trust us, you'll feel it.

Ingredients:
Horny Goat Weed (Epimedium sagittatum) (aerial part) (providing 10 mg of lcarlins), Maca Root (powder), Tribulus Terrestris Extract (standardized to 40% saponins) (aerial parts), Polypodium vulgare (powder) (root & rhizome), Polypodium vulgare (powder) (root & rhizome), Saw Palmetto Berry (powder), Muira Puama Root (powder), L-Arginine (as HCl), Panax Ginseng Root (powder), Cayenne Pepper Powder (fruit) (40,000 HUT/g)
Other Ingredients: Rice flour, cellulose (vegetable capsule) and vegetable magnesium stearate.

Directions:
Suggested Use: Two (2) capsules daily preferably with food 1-2 hours prior to activity or as directed by a healthcare professional. For maximum effect, take consistently.

Description:
Metabolism Formula: This thyroid complex is designed to be a helper for your thyroid, supporting a healthy metabolism. Say hello to a happy and healthier you.
Supports Focus & Clarity: Tired of living in a mental fog? You will be amazed at how much better you can concentrate and focus when your thyroid is supported. Try it for yourself to see if your productivity soars and allows you to conquer daily tasks with ease!
Wake Up More Rested & Energized: Are you sick and tired of being tired? This All-Natural Thyroid Support will give your thyroid gland the nutrients it craves, helping you wake up more rested and energized.

Ingredients:
Vitamin B-12, iodine, magnesium, zinc, selenium, copper, manganese, molybdenum, l-tyrosine, schizandra, ashwagandha root, bladderwrack, kelp, cayenne pepper.
Other Ingredients: Rice flour, vegetable cellulose (capsule), vegetable magnesium stearate, silica, chlorophyll.

Directions:
Suggested Use: 2 vegetable capsules daily preferably with meals or as directed by a healthcare professional. Use only as directed. For maximum effect take consistently.

Description:
Heart health is the cornerstone for healthy living, and Beet Complete is here to boost your energy, endurance, and recovery time with its delicious, natural black cherry flavor. Our completely vegan, chemical, and caffeine free blend is designed to increase oxygen flow throughout the body, improving your performance at the gym while supporting your overall heart health. If you’re looking for a pre-workout created to provide maximum workout results, you’ll love the benefits of our nitrate-packed beet formula in Beet Complete.

Ingredients:
Beet Root Powder (Beta vulgaris ), Beet Root Proprietary Blend (Tart Cherry Fruit Concentrate, Hawthorne Berry, Bilberry Fruit Extract and Grape Seed Extract)
Other Ingredients: Citric Acid, Natural Black Cherry Flavor, Syloid, Malic Acid & Stevia.

Directions:
Stir one scoop (8.7g) into 8 oz. of water, juice, smoothie, or your favorite shake daily. Store in a cool dry place. Use only as directed.

Details:
Vegan, Dairy free, egg free, gluten free, soy free, Non GMO, herbicide & pesticide free

Important precautions:
Do not exceed the recommended dose. Pregnant or nursing mothers, children under 18 and individuals with a known medical condition should consult a physician before using this or any dietary supplement. This product is packaged by weight, not by volume. Settling of contents occurs over time. Do not use if safety seal is broken or missing. Keep out of reach of children. Keep your licensed health care practitioner informed when using this product.

Disclaimer:
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

Description:
Scientifically-Formulated: There was great care in combining just the right amount of each ingredient into a premium formula designed to support memory, focus and clarity.
Memory, Focus & Clarity Formula: Neuro-Peak is a “Nootropic”, meaning that it was formulated to help support memory and cognition. The unique combination in this blend is crafted to help support oxygen and circulation in the brain, brain cells and neurons.
Stress & Mood Support: Rhodiola has been used for centuries to support performance. Rhodiola is designed to work with the other premium ingredients in Neuro-Peak to help re-energize your mind, helping you stay focused on your most important tasks.
Convenient Once-Per-Day Dose: Forget cluttering your cabinets and countertops with several bottles. Zhou Nutrition’s Neuro-Peak offers the benefits of several ' brain pills ' in a single, once-daily supplement. It’s about time someone combined these time-tested ingredients into one capsule.

Ingredients:
Vitamin B12 (as Cyanocobalamin), Bacopa Monnieri Extract (whole plant), Phosphatidylserine (20%), Ginkgo Biloba (24% Ginkgo Flavone Glycosides) (leaf), Rhodiola Rosea Extract (Salidroside 3% Rosavins 1%) (root), DMAE (Dimethylaminoethanol Bitartrate)
Other Ingredients: Gelatin (capsule), rice flour, vegetable magnesium stearate, silica.

Directions:
Suggested Use: 1 capsule taken 1 to 2 times daily preferably with meals or as directed by a healthcare professional.

Details:
Free Of: Gluten, milk, eggs, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts, wheat and GMO ingredients.

Important precautions:
Do not use if safety seal is broken or missing. Keep out of reach of children. Do not exceed the recommended dose. Pregnant or nursing mothers, children under 18 and individuals with a known medical condition should consult a physician before using this or any dietary supplement. Store in a cool dry place.

Disclaimer:
*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

Description:
Your Ultimate Immune Boost: Vitamin C+ is the immunity hero you need to help power through any season. With a unique combination of 270 mg of vitamin C‚ rose hips‚ acerola‚ and bioflavonoids‚ Vitamin C+ is an immune system booster that packs a punch to help you perform. Antioxidant Powerhouse: Vitamin C+ includes bioflavonoids that work together with vitamin C to add an extra boost of antioxidant power to help your body fight free radicals. Use Vitamin C+ as part of your daily routine for an added antioxidant boost.

Ingredients:
Vitamin C (ascorbic acid), Vitamin C+ Immune Complex (Acerola Fruit Extract, Citrus Bioflavonoids, Rose Hips Fruit Extract)
Other ingredients: Raw Cane Sugar, Organic Tapioca Syrup, Water, Pectin, Sodium Citrate, Natural Flavors, and Annatto (color)

For adults and children ages 4+‚ take two (2) gummies daily or as directed by a healthcare professional.

Zhou Mushroom 8-Plex is a convenient way to boost immune health, brain health, energy and endurance. Each one-teaspoon serving delivers 250 mg each of eight organic, fermented superfood mushrooms: chaga, maitake, reishi, agaricus blazei, shiitake, turkey tail, cordyceps and lion's mane. This ready-to-use powder mixes easily into coffee, smoothies or other recipes.
